LanguageData.Supernova.label: Supernova explosion
LanguageData.SuperHeatWave.label: Incredibly hot weather
LanguageData.SuperHeatWave.letterText: Incredibly strong heat wave overtook the planet. The temperature can rise to 100 degrees!
LanguageData.BoulderMassHit.label: Meteor Rain
LanguageData.BoulderMassHit.letterText: Meteor Rain! For some time, meteorites will fall to the ground.
LanguageData.Endlessday.label: Long Day
LanguageData.Endlessday.letterText: Because of the powerful flash of a star on the planet, it is now day. And nothing more
LanguageData.LeanAtmosphere.label: Lean atmosphere
LanguageData.LeanAtmosphere.letterText: As a result of the powerful release of a large amount of energy from the explosion of a star, a part of the planet’s atmosphere burned out. It will change all the climatic conditions on the planet. Expect constant temperature drops
LanguageData.RadiationFon.label: Increased Radiation
LanguageData.RadiationFon.letterText: Due to the absence of a part of the atmosphere, cosmic radiation leaks onto the planet very easily. We do not recommend to be in an open area.
LanguageData.NoSun.label: No Sun
LanguageData.DenseAtmosphere.label: Dense Atmosphere
LanguageData.IceStorm.label: Ice Storm
LanguageData.IceStorm.letterText: An ice storm overtook you. This storm carries incredible low temperatures and ice fragments. Do not leave the house
LanguageData.HeavyAir.label: Heavy Air
LanguageData.HeavyAir.letterText: The air flow brought a large amount of heavy gases, they make breathing difficult and poison the body, you need to wait a couple of days
LanguageData.MechanoidPortal.label: Teleport mechanoids!
LanguageData.MechanoidPortal.letterText: A mysterious fragment has fallen from the sky, which generates a teleport from which mechanoids appear. The portal itself is not destroyed, but if you break the generator, then the portal will disappear.
LanguageData.BeetleRush.label: Hive!
LanguageData.BeetleRush.letterText: Cave beetles dug a tunnel out of their hive. They will go out until you close the passage.
LanguageData.DestroyRoad.label: Undermining the road
LanguageData.DestroyRoad.letterText: A small detachment of robbers blew one of the roads.
LanguageData.ShipCrash.label: Ship wreck
LanguageData.ShipCrash.letterText: Unknown ship crashed. Many pieces were scattered around the planet. You can research them to get resources or find new technologies.
LanguageData.SandStorm.label: Sand Storm
LanguageData.SandStorm.letterText: A sandstorm is coming. During this time, will be reduced visibility, speed
